name: Mob Vs Mutant
description:
Mob Vs Mutant is a game created for StaffsJam 2021 created by a team of 5 in under a week and also happens to be the first game I have ever made. The game consists of the player controlling a mutant on the run from the mob. My role in the development of the game was kitbashing different models to create the environments whilst also applying textures and creating the lighting for each scene.

Being my first ever game created in unreal for the first time, I learned how to manage scenes and how to import assets into an unreal project alongside using lights and applying materials to models.

Feel free to download and check it out !
